title:
Generation of Geodesics with Actor-Critic Reinforcement Learning to
  Predict Midpoints
abstract:
To find the shortest paths for all pairs on manifolds with infinitesimally
defined metrics, we propose to generate them by predicting midpoints
recursively and an actor-critic method to learn midpoint prediction. We prove
the soundness of our approach and show experimentally that the proposed method
outperforms existing methods on both local and global path planning tasks.
